Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Cermak-Chinatown
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
